videos.title: Everything got banned! FINAL FANTASY cards are good now
videos.description:
Now the so many powerful cards have been banned in Standard, it's time for FINAL FANTASY cards to really shine.

Decklist - https://moxfield.com/decks/VFqHbJ86AE6bE-RAbc7P0Q
